summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the behavior of EC2 AMI operations using the Moto library to mock AWS services. It covers creating, copying, describing, filtering, tagging, and deregistering AMIs, as well as handling attributes, permissions, and related snapshots.
business_intent: To ensure that the Moto mock implementation accurately reproduces AWS EC2 AMI functionality, providing reliable unit tests for applications that interact with AMI APIs.
